src:
Gunung Merapi Alami Dua Kali Gempa Guguran
04 Nov 2019, 00:38 by Tim detikcom
Yogyakarta - Balai Penyelidikan dan Pengembangan Teknologi Kebencanaan Geologi (BPPTKG) mengatakan Gunung Merapi mengalami dua kali gempa guguran hari ini. Gempa guguran terjadi mulai pukul 06:00-12:00 WIB.
"Dua gempa guguran itu amplitudonya 4-5 mm dan berlangsung 12.6-42.04 detik," kata Kepala BPPTKG Hanik Humaida, dalam keterangan tertulis, Minggu (3/11/2019).
Gempa guguran adalah getaran akibat bongkahan-bongkahan batuan berukuran besar terlepas dari kubah lava. Selain gempa guguran, BPPTKG juga mencatat satu kali gempa tektonik jauh dengan amplitudo 5 mm yang terjadi selama 75.2 detik.
Hanik mengatakan berdasarkan pengamatan visual di puncak Gunung Merapi asap kawah teramati berwarna putih dengan intensitas tebal dan tinggi 450 meter di atas puncak kawah. Cuaca di Gunung Merapi tampak cerah, berawan, mendung, dan terjadi hujan.
Hanik mengatakan, angin bertiup lemah ke arah timur laut dan timur. Suhu udara 20-22.3 derajat Celsius, kelembaban udara 37-96 persen, dengan tekanan udara 629.92-709.65 mmHg dan volume curah hujan 2 mm per hari.
text:
Mount Merapi Has Two Natural Quakes
Nov 04 2019, 00:38 by Tim detikcom
Yogyakarta - The Center for Investigation and Development of Geological Disaster Technology (BPPTKG) said that Mount Merapi had suffered two quake earthquakes today. An earthquake occurred starting at 06: 00-12: 00 WIB.
"The two earthquake avalanches had an amplitude of 4-5 mm and lasted 12.6-42.04 seconds," said Head of BPPTKG Hanik Humaida, in a written statement on Sunday (3/11/2019).
An avalanche is a vibration caused by large pieces of rock apart from the lava dome. In addition to the earthquake, BPPTKG also recorded one tectonic earthquake with an amplitude of 5 mm that occurred during 75.2 seconds.
Hanik said based on visual observations at the peak of Mount Merapi the crater smoke was observed to be white with a thick intensity and height of 450 meters above the crater peak. The weather on Mount Merapi looks sunny, cloudy, cloudy, and there is rain.
Hanik said, the wind was blowing weakly towards the northeast and east. The temperature is 20-22.3 degrees Celsius, humidity is 37-96 percent, with air pressure 629.92-709.65 mmHg and rainfall volume 2 mm per day.
